description: Notable events and correlation alerts from security tools

fields.name: host
fields.description: The host that generated the event

fields.name: signature
fields.description: The name of the alert or correlation rule

fields.name: severity
fields.description: The severity level (critical, high, medium, low, informational)

fields.name: dest
fields.description: The destination system involved in the alert

fields.name: src
fields.description: The source system involved in the alert

fields.name: user
fields.description: The user involved in the alert

fields.name: description
fields.description: A detailed description of the alert

fields.name: risk_score
fields.description: The risk score associated with the alert

fields.name: signature_id
fields.description: The unique identifier of the alert rule

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the alert (new, in progress, resolved, closed)

fields.name: tag
fields.description: The tags associated with the event
